channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by TNS Ilres and Kantar Public for Luxemburger Wort and RTL, 10–24 November 2021 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Chrëschtlech-Sozial Vollekspartei (EPP): 1–2 seats
  • Lëtzebuerger Sozialistesch Aarbechterpartei (S&D): 1–2 seats
  • Demokratesch Partei (RE): 1 seats
  • déi gréng (Greens/EFA): 1 seats
  • Alternativ Demokratesch Reformpartei (ECR): 0–1 seats
  • déi Lénk (GUE/NGL): 0 seats
  • Piratepartei Lëtzebuerg (Greens/EFA): 0–1 seats
  • Kommunistesch Partei Lëtzebuerg (*): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by TNS Ilres and Kantar Public for Luxemburger Wort and RTL, 10–24 November 2021 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by TNS Ilres and Kantar Public for Luxemburger Wort and RTL, 10–24 November 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Chrëschtlech-Sozial Vollekspartei (EPP): 19.8–23.5%
  • Lëtzebuerger Sozialistesch Aarbechterpartei (S&D): 18.5–22.1%
  • Demokratesch Partei (RE): 14.6–17.9%
  • déi gréng (Greens/EFA): 11.0–14.0%
  • Alternativ Demokratesch Reformpartei (ECR): 9.9–12.8%
  • déi Lénk (GUE/NGL): 4.1–6.1%
  • Piratepartei Lëtzebuerg (Greens/EFA): 9.8–12.6%
  • Kommunistesch Partei Lëtzebuerg (*): 0.5–1.3%
